name: Thoma
desc: The Kamisato Clan's housekeeper. A well-known "fixer" in Inazuma.

desc.text:
Thoma's official title in the Kamisato Clan is that of a "housekeeper," and as such, he is responsible for matters such as cleaning and cooking.
Whenever he appears at the Yashiro Commission, Thoma is almost always busy with such work. He is able to get everything done well, and even Furuta, the butler of the Kamisato Clan, is full of praise for his housekeeping skills.
However, most of the time, Thoma does not stay in the Yashiro Commission, but goes elsewhere to deal with some special matters discreetly.
For example: solving the problems encountered by the Yashiro Commission, asking for information for the head of the Kamisato Clan, fulfilling Ayaka's wishes, etc.
In those unknown corners, Thoma has always used his own way to develop the influence of the Yashiro Commission.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 2</color>
Thoma seems to have been born with a good temper.
Regardless of whether he's dealing with a dignitary or a street vendor, Thoma can easily find an opening to join the conversation and have a good time with them.
Thoma, who is good at socializing, has a wide range of contacts in Inazuma. When he first arrived in Inazuma, he relied on his insight and communication skills to make friends with people in various industries. Later, many people would take the initiative to get to know Thoma.
The more people you know, the more resources you can get. Thoma would learn a lot of first-hand information from them, or quietly strike "deals" that are beneficial to the Yashiro Commission.
However, although Thoma has a vast network of contacts, he has never used it for personal gain, nor has he ever forced others to do things in the name of the Yashiro Commission.
Sociability, precise judgment, and just the right amount of tact. Perhaps this is the reason why Thoma can thrive as a "fixer" in Inazuma.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3</color>
Surprisingly, the handsome and cheerful Thoma has no resistance when it comes to cute animals.
When Thoma's out, he always carries some small snacks for animals, and feeds stray cats and dogs when he sees them.
It never fails to make him smile seeing animals scarf food down.
To Thoma, these animals, like himself, are part of what makes up the world.
Even if they don't seem to be eye-catching, they are still trying to live.
As long as you live, good things will always happen... This is what Thoma has always believed in.
Even if these animals had not encountered good things before, he hoped that at least his presence would be a good thing worth celebrating for.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
As the housekeeper of the Kamisato Clan, Thoma is an "all-rounder" when it comes to housekeeping.
Whether it's cleaning, cooking, sewing, gardening, caregiving, or socializing, he can handle it all with ease.
For Thoma, housekeeping is not only a job and duty, but also his hobby.
He would clean the house like new, making sure that there was not a single grain of dust left on the railings. He would be in a very happy mood when faced with a clean and tidy Yashiro Commission.
Perhaps it's the sense of accomplishment that comes with cleaning. Whenever he has the chance, Thoma will pick up a broom or duster and sweep away any unsightly stains.
In addition, he also takes special care of the daily lives of his colleagues around him.
There was a winter when Inazuma's temperature suddenly dipped, and a guard of the Yashiro Commission accidentally caught a cold while out on patrol. A few days later, he unexpectedly received a sweater hand-knitted by Thoma.
The sweater that was just the right size made the guard think back to the clothes he received from his mother every winter. Now that his mother was old, she hadn't sent him clothes for many years.
With this in mind, the guard took a long leave of absence to visit his family. The day he came back, he brought Thoma a special souvenir from his hometown, and they became good friends.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5</color>
Thoma's father is an Inazuman and his mother is a Mondstadter.
Thoma grew up in Mondstadt and has been accustomed to its carefree and happy atmosphere since he was young. Influenced by this, he can easily mingle with anyone.
However, he has also been taught by his father since he was a child and places great importance on the word "loyalty".
After Thoma's father returned to Inazuma, he was worried that his old man would not be able to drink Mondstadt's wine there, so he sailed to Inazuma alone in a boat carrying Dandelion Wine.
On the way, a huge wave overturned the boat and Thoma fell into the water. Fortunately, he just drifted unconscious down the water until he drifted to a beach on Inazuma.
At that time, Thoma had nothing and no family with him, but still started his life in Inazuma with optimism.
However, despite his best efforts, he was unable to find his father, who was supposed to be in Inazuma.
But at his most difficult moment, Thoma met someone in Inazuma who was worthy of his "loyalty" to the end.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
Due to him hailing from Mondstadt, Thoma is often regarded as an "outsider" by the local residents of Inazuma.
Despite the strange looks and gossip directed towards him, Thoma never showed any dissatisfaction, and always smiled at all doubts.
Thoma is recognized as the most amiable person in the Yashiro Commission, but to outsiders, it is another story.
"Don't offend Thoma! Otherwise, things will be difficult to handle."
No one is sure when it started, but this saying has gone around that many people are convinced of this when they hear it.
As for those who have had unpleasant run-ins with Thoma, the mention of him still brings lingering fear:
"Don't be fooled by that guy! He's always smiling kindly, but all I did was cheat the Yashiro Commission of a small sum of money, and he..."
That's right, if anyone dares to harm the interests of the Yashiro Commission or disrespect the Kamisato siblings, Thoma will make them pay.
He sees this as his duty and does his best, but does not like to boast about his achievements. Even if he is criticized for this, he will not defend himself too much.
"Gee, who cares about such trivialities? And it doesn't matter what kind of person I am, as long as those who should know know it."

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
Thoma's favorite duster has been with him in many "conquests".
As it has been used for too long, no matter how Thoma cleans and takes care of it now, it still looks old and gray. Despite this, Thoma is still reluctant to discard it.
This duster was given to Thoma when he was first assigned cleaning duties at Yashiro Commission. As soon as he sees it, he recalls those hard but happy times.
At that time, Thoma had yet to comprehend various cleaning techniques. Due to his lack of experience, he was often busy doing all kinds of cleaning and tidying work until late at night.
Accompanying him were the moonlight above his head, the chirping of insects in the summer night, and the sound of a duster tapping on the beams.
There are many different kinds of cleaning. From a simple cleaning to an all-out deep cleaning, Thoma has experienced it all.
At first, he found the work boring, but after he got used to it, he found that he could think more quietly when cleaning.
So to this day, Thoma often uses this duster to perform his work.
While brushing away the dust in front of him, he also brushed away the fog in his head in a quiet and steady state of mind.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
In his early years living in Mondstadt, Thoma did not have particularly strong aspirations.
Each day, he is awakened by the early morning sun and the fresh fragrance of flowers. After breakfast, he can choose to take a relaxing stroll through the city or explore the wilderness freely.
At that time, Thoma thought that people should have the happiness of living a leisurely life. Perhaps it would have been better to live a peaceful life.
This calm mood disappeared the moment when he was swept into a strange country by the waves, across the ocean in a small boat.
Here, he had to receive a favor to survive, and thus the thought of "repayment" arose.
Ten years ago, when the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan was losing its power.
Kamisato Ayato, who was embroiled in the dispute over the succession rights of the clan due to the death of both parents, told Thoma:
"Now that the situation in Inazuma is unclear, the trouble the Kamisato Clan faces will only increase. You are someone who can see what's at stake, so if you don't want to get involved, leave early."
Could Thoma, who had received so many favors from the Kamisato Clan, just leave like that? Choosing to leave would mean that he would have to return to his ordinary, stable life with regrets and guilt.
The storm was imminent, and Thoma was like a leaf drifting in the sea.
But after much deliberation, Thoma's answer was:
"If I leave at this time, I will lose my loyalty and righteousness. Father has always taught me to be a loyal and righteous man... I would like to do my best to do my part for the young master and the young lady. The path you will take in the future will certainly need me as a helper."
The will to burn for loyalty and righteousness forged a strong desire that drew the attention of the gods.
As if to respond to Thoma's choice - on this night of divergent destinies, a Vision, bright red like a blaze appeared beside him.

imgDesc.text:
Original Outfit - Warrior of Flame
Thoma's outfit. He cropped the pieces of this light suit of armor till only the thigh and arm guards were left, allowing him to comfortably attend to all matters in and out of combat.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>October 29, 2021</color>
Travelers \ (^ o ^) / ~
Today, we will be introducing a new character, Thoma!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/1310776</color>

<color=#ffd780>October 29, 2021</color>
"If you don't mind, how about making friends with me? You won't regret it."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/1311184</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 9, 2022</color>
"Watching the drifting dandelions reminds me of the many interesting things in Mondstadt..."
"Traveler, Paimon, thanks for listening. It's nice to chat with someone when you miss home."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/1902224</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 9, 2022</color>
Oh, you're here!
I clearly haven't whistled yet, but all the small animals came out in droves and pounced on me.
Surely they didn't come to celebrate my birthday to thank me for looking after them all this time?
Haha, thanks! Hanging out with a large group of friends sounds like a lot of fun!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/1902225</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 9, 2023</color>
"This Rice Cake Soup is really delicious! Eh? I wonder if Taroumaru wants some..."
"Your cooking is pretty good. Thanks, Traveler!"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/14916331</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 9, 2023</color>
The blooming Windwheel Asters of Windrise... and the Cecilias by the cliff...
Their fresh scent reminds me of the flower shop in Mondstadt when I was a child...
Haha... look at me, rambling on and on like an old man. Sorry about that.
Thank you for the garland! I can totally see your handiwork.
Guess I'll be making a dish from Mondstadt for lunch today. Is there anything you want to eat? Feel free to let me know!
Thanks to tokki for the fantastic artwork!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/14916332</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 9, 2023</color>
Happy Birthday, Thoma!
Thanks for the amazing art from @guryfrog
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/Paimon2theMoon/status/1612464343903346690</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 9, 2024</color>
"That tanuki that just disappeared... What form has it taken now?"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/24222255</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 9, 2024</color>
This morning, I received a gift that was signed "Blessings from Windrise."
Let me guess... It was from you, right? This Windwheel Aster still carries with it a trace of Mondstadt's wind. Thank you~
Whenever I see a Windwheel Aster, I think of the giant tree at Windrise, of Springvale's windmill, and the faint aroma of wine drifting on the wind... Ah, how nostalgic!
If I ever get the chance to return to Mondstadt, would you come along too? Traveling by your side would make the journey so much more enjoyable!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/24222269</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 9, 2025</color>
"Where did Sayu go? I just saw her a moment ago... She really lives up to the 'ninja' title, huh? Her ninjutsu is so impressive, now I'm even more curious."
"Zzz..."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/36240363</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 9, 2025</color>
It's customary to give the house a thorough cleaning at the beginning of each year to usher in the fresh start ahead.
So, I woke up early this morning and made sure to clean every corner of Komore Teahouse. It looks as good as new now, doesn't it?
And while cleaning, I happened to find the toy that Taroumaru had been searching for ages. When I cleaned it and handed it back to him, haha, you should've seen the joy on his face.
Look, he's still so excited. Wanna play with him?
Thanks to tokki for the fantastic artwork!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/36240365</color>
Version 2.2 - Into the Perilous Labyrinth of Fog

<color=#ffd780>March 14, 2022</color>
Have you tried Cocoa Paste? It's sweet and rich, and you can make a sweet called chocolate with it.
Sometimes people add other ingredients, like Dandelion Wine, dried Sunsettias, Mints, etc...
Haha, don't you think it sounds a lot like the hot pot game?
So this time, I tried to make chocolate with different ingredients, and they all tasted pretty good.
Come try some too. See which flavor you first taste!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/3805097</color>

<color=#ffd780>April 1, 2022</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Japanese]</color>
"Traveler, do you know what day it is today?! Huh? Why is everyone in such a hurry?"
"This morning I was told today was a holiday, but it wasn't? Hmm... what does that mean?"
"Traveler, has anything unusual happened around you?"
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/Genshin_7/status/1509697053626044434</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 28, 2024</color>
Happy 4-year anniversary, everyone!
Kudos to JDD7 for the amazing work!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/Paimon2theMoon/status/1839878198072635572</color>

Hello Travelers! The official Genshin Impact Bilibili account has now surpassed 9 million followers.

Thanks to your continued love and support, Genshin Impact's official YouTube channel has now surpassed 5 million subscribers!

Hello, Travelers! The official Genshin Impact Douyin account has now surpassed 5 million followers. Thank you, Travelers, for your support and companionship~
<color=#ffacff>Mihoyo:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/ys.mihoyo.com/main/news/detail/117380</color>

desc.text:
When a character protected by Thoma's own <color=#ffd780>Blazing Barrier</color> (Thoma excluded) is attacked, Thoma's own <color=#ffd780>Blazing Blessing</color> CD is decreased by 3s, while his own <color=#ffd780>Crimson Ooyoroi</color> 's CD is decreased by 3s.
This effect can be triggered once every 20s.
<color=#ffd780>Crimson Ooyoroi</color> 's duration is increased by 3s.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Blazing Blessing</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
After using <color=#ffd780>Crimson Ooyoroi</color> , 15 Energy will be restored to Thoma.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Crimson Ooyoroi</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
When a <color=#ffd780>Blazing Barrier</color> is obtained or refreshed, the DMG dealt by all party members' Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks is increased by 15% for 6s.

voice.title: Hello
voice.desc: It's good to meet you at last, Traveler. I've been hearing about you for a long time now. I'm your new buddy, Thoma — as long as that's okay with you, of course!

voice.title: Chat: Thoma's Treat
voice.desc: Hey... how about we go for a nice meal some time? My treat, of course.

voice.title: Chat: Concern
voice.desc: I feel like there's something I forgot to do... hmm, I tidied the courtyard, put the tea on... Eh, it's probably just my mind playing tricks on me.

voice.title: Chat: Mora
voice.desc: I really did spend a lot recently, only 10 Mora left... Still, 10 Mora's better than no Mora!

voice.title: When It Rains
voice.desc: Where'd this rain come from? Are you gonna be okay? Here, I'll lend you my coat...

voice.title: When Thunder Strikes
voice.desc: You don't wanna be out in open country in this kind of weather. You'll get struck by lightning for sure.

voice.title: When It Snows
voice.desc: Don't run on the ice... 'cause if you fall down, I won't help you up, you gotta learn somehow.

voice.title: When the Sun Is Out
voice.desc: Lovely weather we're having! Will you join me for a walk?

voice.title: Good Morning
voice.desc: Morning! If you're free, why not come with me to the market? The vegetables are freshest earlier in the day.

voice.title: Good Afternoon
voice.desc: On the lunch menu today, we have Sakura Tempura and Tricolor Dango! Here, there's some for you, some for Paimon, and I also put some aside for milady and the man of the clan himself. Ah, wait, I forgot someone... There's none for me...

voice.title: Good Evening
voice.desc: Come quick, we gotta get down to the market — they slash the prices on fish around this time of day. Oh, and if you find something that you just can't do without, I'll help you haggle the price down.

voice.title: Good Night
voice.desc: Okay, good night. You had a busy day today, you should get some rest, too. Don't stay up late.

voice.title: About Thoma: Housekeeper
voice.desc: It was never Ayaka or Ayato's intention to make me the housekeeper, I volunteered. I like this kind of work. Putting everything in order gives me a great sense of achievement, and based on everyone's reactions... Yeah, I think I do a pretty good job.

voice.title: About Thoma: Meaning
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

For me, housework is about keeping a space clean and tidy, so that everyone who lives there has a smile on their face. And now... it looks like I'm responsible for another smile. I'll do my best to deliver!

voice.title: About Us: Eating Alone
voice.desc: Hey, how come you're eating here all alone? ...Uh, is it okay if I join you? Or did you just want some space?

voice.title: About Us: Oath
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

Complete "Stillness, the Sublimation of Shadow"

If you hadn't put yourself out there during the Vision Hunt Ceremony and taken on the Raiden Shogun all by yourself, I would've lost my Vision, and with it all my aspirations. I've been thinking about this a lot, and it seems there's only one way I could ever properly repay you...
I, Thoma, give to you my weapon and my loyalty, and I promise to fight for you, no matter what.

voice.title: About the Vision
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Those that receive Visions should look after them. I certainly don't plan on losing mine.

voice.title: Something to Share
voice.desc: I've gotten to know all kinds of people over the years, and I'd say that Inazumans are more particular about etiquette than Mondstadters. If you make sure you're always polite to people, it's much easier to get things done.

voice.title: Interesting Things: Tanuki
voice.desc: I've always wanted to see a tanuki shapeshifting. They say it can change into all kinds of things, and that it likes to play pranks on passersby. It's a creature with a sense of humor, that's for sure.

voice.title: Interesting Things: Animals
voice.desc: Are you an animal person, too? If you are, let me take you to the outskirts some time, it's great. I just need to give a whistle, and all these puppies and kittens will come out of nowhere and start strutting around your ankles, clamoring for your affection. Haha, just imagining it is already brightening my day.

voice.title: About Yae Miko
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Lady Miko? Wh—What about her? *sigh* Every time Miss Kamisato sends me out to deliver messages, my least-favorite destination is the Grand Narukami Shrine... Oh! N—Not because Lady Miko scares the bejeebers out of me, it's, uh... respect. Yes! She strikes respect deep into my heart, ahahahaha...

voice.title: About the Raiden Shogun: Comparison
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

In my homeland of Mondstadt, almost everyone has great reverence for the Anemo Archon, Barbatos. But people in Inazuma feel a little differently toward the Shogun. How can I put this... They feel love, respect, gratitude... but also fear.

voice.title: About the Raiden Shogun: The Unknown
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Complete "Stillness, the Sublimation of Shadow"

Honestly, I don't harbor any resentment toward the Shogun. Yes, she almost took my Vision away, but ultimately that's just because of her unique perspective. Everyone has their own perspective, there's nothing strange about that.
The only thing I don't understand is her goal in doing so. What does she imagine eternity really looks like for Inazuma? And why is sacrificing her people's aspirations so necessary to achieve it? I can neither understand nor agree with her approach.

voice.title: About Beidou
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Complete "Stillness, the Sublimation of Shadow"

The captain of The Crux — a formidable woman indeed. She once promised to take me out onto the open ocean to get a look at the thunderstorm that seals off Inazuma from the outside world. It's a shame that to this day, I've never had the chance to take her up on the offer...

voice.title: About Kamisato Ayato
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

As head of the Kamisato Clan, he's in a tough position. With all the political upheaval, he has to contend with public disquiet on one hand and a bunch of self-serving, degenerate public officials on the other. It's best not to dwell on it. All I can do is make sure to look out for him when he's at home.

voice.title: About Kamisato Ayaka
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Complete "Stillness, the Sublimation of Shadow"

Milady is in all respects a well-rounded person: erudite, compassionate, well-mannered, and elegant... The one thing she could do better is to speak her mind more. In fact, watch out for this the next time you're talking to her — sometimes, she looks like she's about to say something, but then she holds back. If that happens, keep asking her opinion, see if you can encourage her to open up a little.

voice.title: About Yoimiya
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Of Naganohara Fireworks fame? She's so easy to get along with. Super straightforward, just says whatever she thinks. Oh, and Naganohara fireworks are just incredible, you should take every chance you get to see them in action. Ah, on that note — here, have a coupon!

voice.title: About Sayu
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Ah Sayu, stubborn Sayu. I've asked her countless times to teach me ninjutsu, but she always refuses. She even goes out of her way to avoid me now... I'm just a student looking for a teacher, am I really that out of line?

voice.title: About Kujou Sara
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

The Tenryou Commission General... Mm... Make sure to be extra careful if you have any dealings with her. She has a lot of power in her hands, and she's not very open to persuasion. Smiling and batting your eyelids certainly won't get you anywhere with her.

voice.title: About Arataki Itto
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Hmm... Word on the street is that he's quite a character — apparently, he even has youkai heritage. Have you met him? If you two are close, maybe you could introduce me sometime. It's good to make friends from all walks of life... youkai included!

voice.title: About Shikanoin Heizou
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Ho, that guy is a detective for the Tenryou Commission. He seems to have his own way of doing things — not the easiest person to get along with. Also... Any situation that involves a detective is probably not one that's going to end well. I think I'll keep on giving him a wide berth.

voice.title: About Jean
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Oh, so Jean from the Gunnhildr Clan is the Master of the Knights of Favonius now? She definitely deserves it, she's known all over for her impeccable conduct... Oh, just the "Acting" Grand Master? Haha, well, someone of her standing won't care about titles.

voice.title: About Eula
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

You've had a run-in with Eula Lawrence before, huh? All I know is that their whole family are about the worst-tempered people you could ever meet. You're better off steering clear of them if you can help it. Ah, now I'm in a Mondstadt mood again... The memories.

voice.title: More About Thoma: I
voice.desc: Anything I can lend a hand with? If something needs doing around the house or you're having some interpersonal strife, just say the word. Hmm? A conversation... I see, I see. That's a little different from what I'm used to, but I'm all for it.

voice.title: More About Thoma: II
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3

I'm not from Inazuma originally — I think I've told you that before, right? I took a boat all the way here from Mondstadt, found I liked the place, and was also lucky enough to meet the wonderful Kamisato siblings, so I just ended up staying.

voice.title: More About Thoma: III
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

I get homesick once in a while, too, so I completely relate to all the international merchants on Ritou. I try to look out for them as much as I can. The difference between us is that they see themselves as just passing by, and have no intention of trying to integrate here. And because that's how they think, it becomes their reality. The majority of Inazumans will never see them as anything more than outsiders.

voice.title: More About Thoma: IV
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5

For some of the more conservatively minded people in Inazuma, the idea of an outlander working as a retainer for one of the Commissions is unthinkable. So there was a time when I was not that welcome here. I'm pretty sure I'd have been deported a long time ago without a couple of Kamisatos fighting my corner. I couldn't let the clan down after they'd been so kind to me, so I put in a lot of honest work, and eventually, everyone was finally able to accept me.

voice.title: More About Thoma: V
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

I'm not sure if I should get into this, but... Ah, hopefully you won't mind. I went through a period where I really just wanted to go home — Mondstadt is my homeland, after all. But I was torn... It wouldn't be easy to leave Inazuma behind, either. I mean, just look how good the people here have been to me. The Kamisato Clan always has a room for me, and there are people I've met here that are like family. So, I went back and forth over it, and ultimately decided I'd stay in Inazuma. When I'm missing Mondstadt... I can just chat with you. You don't mind my rambling, do you?

voice.title: Thoma's Hobbies
voice.desc: I've been really getting into stories about the unnatural recently. Especially ones about shapeshifting youkai — they're so fascinating. Before that, I was really into ninjutsu for a while, and before that... Hmm? You think I'm not dedicated enough? N—No! It's not like that, you got me all wrong!

voice.title: Thoma's Troubles
voice.desc: I'm in a real pickle here. The chief is hosting a banquet for his friends tonight, and he says he wants me to splurge a little by cooking some Butter Crab. The only problem is that for the last two days, I haven't been able to buy crab anywhere! So, what, am I gonna have to dive into the ocean and grab them myself?

voice.title: Favorite Food
voice.desc: Without a doubt, my favorite food is Rice Cake Soup. I like cooking up a big, delicious potful for everyone to share. It's a recipe for a good time.

voice.title: Least Favorite Food
voice.desc: As far as food is concerned, I'm fine with anything. If we're counting beverages, though... I'm not very good with alcohol. Don't laugh, and before you say it — yes, I've wondered what this says about my identity as a Mondstadter. But, y'know... too much alcohol is bad for you, anyway. So not drinking is a good thing.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: I
voice.desc: Delicious! Could I get another bowl of rice?

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: II
voice.desc: Um, are you free right now? Would you mind sharing some of your cooking tips with me?

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: III
voice.desc: I don't think I've ever tasted anything like this... Oh, it's not too bad, though.

voice.title: Birthday
voice.desc: Quick, come with me! I remembered it's your birthday, obviously, so I thought I'd throw you a proper party. There's food, there's drinks, and I invited a whole bunch of your friends, too. Hey, this is your birthday we're talking about! I wasn't about to let you spend it all alone!

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Ascension Phase 1

Really? This'll make me stronger? You'd better not be kidding, I have stacks of laundry to do.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Ascension Phase 2

It feels like... a fire inside of me has just begun to burn.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Ascension Phase 4

I have all of this power, but how should I use it? I need to give this one some serious thought.

voice.title: Feelings about Ascension: Conclusion
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Ascension Phase 6

Thank you for placing your trust in me. Your kindness warms my heart more than the brightest flame ever could. But not to worry, I've figured out what I want to do now. My strength is your shield, and I will always be here to protect you.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: I
voice.desc: Fire it up!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: II
voice.desc: Check this out~

voice.title: Elemental Skill: III
voice.desc: Don't get too close!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: I
voice.desc: Here's backup.

voice.title: Elemental Burst: II
voice.desc: Supporting fire!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: III
voice.desc: I got you covered.

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: I
voice.desc: Ooh, what's in here?

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
voice.desc: Mm! The fortune slip was right...

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
voice.desc: Hehe, finders keepers.

voice.title: Low HP: I
voice.desc: Hey! What was that for?

voice.title: Low HP: II
voice.desc: I'm done for...

voice.title: Low HP: III
voice.desc: *grimace* Right where it hurts...

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: I
voice.desc: Don't despair, I'm here to help.

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: II
voice.desc: What a mess... go on, take a rest.

voice.title: Fallen: I
voice.desc: Time to go home...

voice.title: Fallen: II
voice.desc: Take care, everyone...

voice.title: Fallen: III
voice.desc: I couldn't save everybody...

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: Ow ow ow...

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: II
voice.desc: Stop it!

voice.title: Joining Party: I
voice.desc: I guess the housework can wait.

voice.title: Joining Party: II
voice.desc: Let's get out there and make some friends.

voice.title: Joining Party: III
voice.desc: Where are we headed this time?

videoCollection.title: Character Demo - "Thoma: Blazing Defense" | Genshin Impact
Collected Miscellany - "Thoma: Crimson Armor of Loyalty" | Genshin Impact
Version 2.0 "The Immovable God and the Eternal Euthymia" Trailer | Genshin Impact
Version 2.2 "Into the Perilous Labyrinth of Fog" Trailer | Genshin Impact

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to four consecutive spear strikes.
<color=#ffd780>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.
<color=#ffd780>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Teachings of Transience
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
Fleeting glories are the highest expression of mortal beauty, for are we mortals not like the flashing lightning itself? Like a lovely dream or blossoming spark, we shall leave a gorgeous mark on the eternal night sky.

materials.name: Treasure Hoarder Insignia
materials.desc: A signet that proudly represents its owner's position as member of the Treasure Hoarders. The pursuit of treasure knows no bounds. That said... Is being a thief something to be proud of?

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Guide to Transience
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
We find the greatest joys in mortal life in transient dreams, for is life itself not like the shadow of the thunder? Pursue your dreams into the clouds if you wish, and enjoy the unexpected silence of the dim lamp-lit nights.

materials.name: Silver Raven Insignia
materials.desc: A raven insignia used by members of the Treasure Hoarders to identify each other. The Treasure Hoarders ask for no resume. Anyone who has an insatiable desire for treasure and is backed up by an equal amount of courage can become a worthy member.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Silver Raven Insignia
materials.desc: A raven insignia used by members of the Treasure Hoarders to identify each other. The Treasure Hoarders ask for no resume. Anyone who has an insatiable desire for treasure and is backed up by an equal amount of courage can become a worthy member.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Philosophies of Transience
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
The fleeting nature of this mortal world is the essence of beauty, for are our lives in this world not akin to the levin flash? Yet the might of the divine comes suddenly, and before the roar of eternity, who can stand?

materials.name: Golden Raven Insignia
materials.desc: A raven insignia that symbolizes the pride and the guiding principle of the Treasure Hoarders. Whether it's hidden amidst the vastness of the land or in the depths of the seas, as long as there are treasures to be hunted down, the spirit of Treasure Hoarders, who will stop at nothing to acquire them, will never die.

materials.name: Hellfire Butterfly
materials.desc:
A warped shard that houses great might. You obtained this from defeating Signora, who unleashed her original power.
The seal of ice was broken under duress, and as her former will surged forth from its pale white prison and she remembered her old name once more, the undying butterfly danced amidst burning flesh and blood. And she remembered her past, wandering the land, spreading the flame, burning away all evil — and she recalled the face of the person she could never meet again.

materials.name: Crown of Insight
materials.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

desc.text:
Thoma vaults forward with his polearm and delivers a flame-filled flying kick that deals <color=#ff9999>AoE Pyro DMG</color> , while also summoning a defensive Blazing Barrier. At the moment of casting, Thoma's Elemental Skill applies <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> to himself.
The DMG Absorption of the Blazing Barrier scales off Thoma's Max HP.
The Blazing Barrier has the following traits:
· Absorbs <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> 250% more effectively.
· When a new Blazing Barrier is obtained, the remaining DMG Absorption of an existing Blazing Barrier will stack and its duration will be refreshed.
The maximum DMG Absorption of the Blazing Barrier will not exceed a certain percentage of Thoma's Max HP.
As a guest from afar, only the most burning passion would allow one to master the pure and precise spear arts of Inazuma. Thoma's mastery, indeed, is not limited to being the "swiftest-studying student" or "a master of the spear," but he has imbued his will to protect others and fend off foes into his art as well.

Thoma spins his polearm, slicing at his foes with roaring flames that deal <color=#ff9999>AoE Pyro DMG</color> and weave themselves into a Scorching Ooyoroi.
<color=#ffd780>Scorching Ooyoroi</color>
While Scorching Ooyoroi is in effect, the active character's Normal Attacks will trigger Fiery Collapse, dealing <color=#ff9999>AoE Pyro DMG</color> and summoning a Blazing Barrier.
Fiery Collapse can be triggered once every 1s.
Except for the amount of DMG they can absorb, the Blazing Barriers created in this way are identical to those created by Thoma's Elemental Skill, Blazing Blessing:
· Absorbs <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> 250% more effectively.
· When a new Blazing Barrier is obtained, the remaining DMG Absorption of an existing Blazing Barrier will stack and its duration will be refreshed.
The maximum DMG Absorption of the Blazing Barrier will not exceed a certain percentage of Thoma's Max HP.
If Thoma falls, the effects of Scorching Ooyoroi will be cleared.
"I will not forget my initial promise. Let this burning flame protect those I cherish, and may it never be extinguished."

When your current active character obtains or refreshes a <color=#ffd780>Blazing Barrier</color> , this character's Shield Strength will increase by 5% for 6s.
This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s seconds. Max 5 stacks.
DMG dealt by <color=#ffd780>Crimson Ooyoroi</color> 's Fiery Collapse is increased by 2.2% of Thoma's Max HP.
When you <color=#ffd780>fish</color> successfully in Inazuma, Thoma's help grants a 20% chance of scoring a double catch.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Agnidus Agate Sliver
materials.desc: Character Ascension Material.

materials.name: Fluorescent Fungus
materials.desc: A mushroom that glows like a night-light. Some curious power lies hidden within it.

materials.name: Treasure Hoarder Insignia
materials.desc: A signet that proudly represents its owner's position as member of the Treasure Hoarders. The pursuit of treasure knows no bounds. That said... Is being a thief something to be proud of?

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Agnidus Agate Fragment
materials.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."

materials.name: Smoldering Pearl
materials.desc:
A crystallization of a Pyro Hypostasis that constantly emits heat.
Even the burning flames shall one day grow cold, and even the ashen firewood can will itself back into a raging blaze. It must then be the will of the world that Pyro Hypostases should constantly cool down and heat up, much like the universe teems with endless life... until the fated darkness shall one day descend and bring it all to naught.

value.name: "Warmth"
value.desc: Thoma's specialty. The intricate appearance of this dish belies the simple ingredients used. But take a sip, and Thoma's sunshine smile comes straight to mind. Perhaps this is his special ability: warming the hearts of others using the simplest of ingredients.

value.name: Thoma
value.desc:
"Protector From Afar" Thoma

A protector from abroad, loyal to the end.
